name: Point of Collection
description: The time at which a business collects personal information from a consumer.

name: Verifiable Consumer Request
description: A request made by a consumer to exercise their rights that the business can reasonably verify.

name: Global Privacy Control (GPC) Signal
description: An automated signal sent by a browser or device that communicates a consumer's choice to opt-out of the sale or sharing of their personal information.

name: Security Breach
description: Unauthorized access and exfiltration, theft, or disclosure of nonencrypted or nonredacted personal information.
